channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Road Wars
channel.desc: A vehicle owner in California jumps onto the back of a tow truck and is taken for a harrowing ride. In England, an angry confrontation between a driver and a cyclist leads to a stumbling foot chase on the sidewalk. In Los Angeles, a biker is hit by a car after scolding its driver for allegedly being on their phone. On a highway in Michigan, a blinding snowstorm causes a 120-car pileup. A motorcycle rider on a freeway in L.A. goes head over heels after slamming into stopped traffic.
